entry.title: Carborundum 11143 - Resin Cloth Regular Sanding Sheets XC0851 Aluminum Oxide 60 Grit (9 Inch x 11 Inch) 05539511143
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carborundum
Type: Regular Sanding Sheets
Price: 1.48

[shortdesc]
  • Cloth sheets are typically used for polishing lathe turnings, rolls and cylinders, light deburring, blending machine tool marks, removing rust and scale, and fine sanding and polishing
  • Cloth sheets are used for hand or machine sanding and have substantially more strength than paper sheets.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum
    Backing Material Resin Cloth
    Dimensions 9x11
    Grit 60
    Length 11 Inch
    Width 9 Inch
    Material XC0851
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Product Type Regular Sanding Sheets

    Product Information

  • P-graded, aluminum oxide abrasive is tough and durable
  • Advanced full resin bond system provides exceptional grain adhesion for long life
  • J-weight backing with increased flexibility
  • superior conformability to complex surfaces and better finishes
  • Ideal for hand sanding, deburring, polishing, and removing cutting tool marks on all metal parts
    		•

entry.title: Carborundum 10876 - Paper Regular Sanding Sheets D0811O Aluminum Oxide 36 Grit (9 Inch x 11 Inch) 05539510876
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carborundum
Type: Regular Sanding Sheets
Price: 1.75

[shortdesc]
  • Paper sheets are engineered for optimum performance when hand or machine sanding metal, wood, composites, and painted surfaces
  • Protective packaging eliminates waste and permits easy, neat storage.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum
    Backing Material Paper
    Dimensions 9x11
    Grit 36
    Length 11 Inch
    Width 9 Inch
    Material D0811O
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Product Type Regular Sanding Sheets

    Product Information

  • P-graded, brown aluminum oxide abrasive is tough and durable
  • Ideal for general-duty dry sanding of paint, primers, light metals, and woods
  • Extensive, P-graded abrasive grit range (P36- P220 grit) designed for heavy- to light-duty hand and machine sanding, coarse to fine
  • Available in three backing weights: A-weight, C-weight, D-weight

Type: Waterproof Sanding Sheets

  • Ideal for obtaining fine finishes and feather-edging painted surfaces.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum
    Backing Material Paper
    Dimensions 9x11
    Grit 60
    Length 11 Inch
    Width 9 Inch
    Material C0414W
    Mineral Silicon Carbide
    Product Type Waterproof Sanding Sheets

    Product Information

  • Silicon carbide abrasive is ideal for finish sanding
  • Resin bond for excellent grain adhesion
  • Strong waterproof paper backing resists deterioration when used wet
  • May be used wet or dry on plastic or painted surfaces
  • best results are obtained when used wet

  • Paper sheets are engineered for optimum performance when hand or machine sanding metal, wood, composites, and painted surfaces

    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum

    Dimensions 9x11
    Grit 80
    Length 11 Inch
    Width 9 Inch
    Material B0412DO
    Mineral Silicon Carbide
    Product Type Dri-Lube Sanding Sheets

    Product Information

  • P-graded, hard, silicon carbide abrasive provides sharp cut, excellent finish
  • Flexible, B-weight, latex-saturated paper backing resists tearing while staying conformable
  • Waterbased, non-loading (No-Fil) stearate resists clogging and increases disc life
  • Recommended for hand and machine sanding paint and primer, as well as whitewood clean-up and sealer sanding
